snippet.title: World War Z Official Mobile and Tablet Game Trailer
snippet.description:
They're coming. Ready? The World War Z game is now available on iOS and Android. Travel the world, defeat enemy hordes, and play to survive. Download the game before the film opens in theaters worldwide on June 21.

Download for iOS: http://bit.ly/WWZGameiOS
Download for Andriod: http://bit.ly/WWZGameDroid
